User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://ovidinternational.com/sitemap.xml

# Optimize crawl rate
Crawl-delay: 1

# Block common bot directories that may not be needed
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /_next/static/
Disallow: /node_modules/

# Allow important assets
Allow: /assets/
Allow: /*.css
Allow: /*.js
Allow: /*.jpg
Allow: /*.png
Allow: /*.svg
Allow: /*.webp
Allow: /*.avif
